42 for a day
 




Cubs and Reds players are united by Jackie Robinson's number.  (AP)



    

    

      
      Sixty years later, Jackie Robinson's legacy 
      lives on with tributes from every team. Sure, sports 
      entertain, but also promote teamwork, camaraderie and can reflect the 
      best of society, Scott Miller says in the Weekend 
      Buzz.

 Pistone: Childress' belief in veteran Burton proving true


    

      
      At one point it seemed 
      like Jeff Burton was through, but RCR gave him a chance and the vet is 
      proving his worth. Sunday, Burton catches Matt Kenseth to capture Texas.
